passage_text: The Queen of Scotland is a dainty but fierce 15-year-old girl named Mary. Reign follows her journey as she re-enters French court after spending her adolescence at a convent. She is torn by her duty to Scotland and her burgeoning love for Francis, her betrothed and future king of France.

In 1557, The Young Queen Mary Stuart of Scotland arrives to France accompanied by her four best friends and Ladies-in-waiting. She is to be engaged with Prince Francis II to get the French in an alliance needed to protect Scotland.
